text:
Excited to share our recent project where we were assigned to help First Engineers become Amby development-wise. While the Bielke&Yang agency handled the design direction, our team, Kohorta, handled the HubSpot CMS and API development. Lots of custom modules, sections and almost everything dnd :fire:

Here’s the result of the collaboration that went live on June 16, so more improvements are coming in upcoming months
<https://www.amby.com/>

<@UMZFZHVUJ> lovely design. How did you achieve the mega menu? I am trying to do the same. Thinking I jsut create a new module as I guess adding new fields (icon and descriptive text) to each menu item using default menu object isn’t a possibility
